verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto me, <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7069>get<s%> thee a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H232>girdle<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it upon thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H935>put<s%> it not in <S%H4325>water<s%>.
So I <S%H7069>got<s%> a <S%H232>girdle<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it on my <S%H4975>loins<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> that thou hast <S%H7069>got<s%>, which is upon thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H2934>hide<s%> it there in a <S%H5357>hole<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>.
So I <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> it by <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from thence, which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee to <S%H2934>hide<s%> there.

Then I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, and <S%H2658>digged<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H232>girdle<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where I had <S%H2934>hid<s%> it: and, behold, the <S%H232>girdle<s%> was <S%H7843>marred<s%>, it was <S%H6743>profitable<s%> for nothing.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, After this manner will I <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

This <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, which <S%H3987>refuse<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>, which <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, shall even be as this <S%H232>girdle<s%>, which is <S%H6743>good<s%> for nothing.

For as the <S%H232>girdle<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> to the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, so have I caused to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto me the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; that they might be unto me for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and for a <S%H8034>name<s%>, and for a <S%H8416>praise<s%>, and for a <S%H8597>glory<s%>: but they would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

¶ Therefore thou shalt <S%H559>speak<s%> unto them this <S%H1697>word<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>: and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Do we not <S%H3045>certainly<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that every <S%H5035>bottle<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H3196>wine<s%>?

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%>, even the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%>.

And I will <S%H5310>dash<s%> them <S%H376>one<s%> against <S%H251>another<s%>, even the <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: I will not <S%H2550>pity<s%>, nor <S%H2347>spare<s%>, nor have <S%H7355>mercy<s%>, but <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them.
¶ <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye, and give <S%H238>ear<s%>; be not <S%H1361>proud<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, before he cause <S%H2821>darkness<s%>, and before your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5062>stumble<s%> upon the <S%H5399>dark<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and, while ye <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%>, he <S%H7760>turn<s%> it into the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, and <S%H7896%H7896>make<s%> it gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%>.

But if ye will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> your <S%H1466>pride<s%>; and mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H1830>weep<s%> <S%H1830>sore<s%>, and run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5739>flock<s%> is carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> and to the <S%H1377>queen<s%>, <S%H8213>Humble<s%> yourselves, sit <S%H3427>down<s%>: for your <S%H4761>principalities<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%>, even the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of your <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall be shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, and none shall <S%H6605>open<s%> them: <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> all of it, it shall be <S%H7965>wholly<s%> carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> them that <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%>: where is the <S%H5739>flock<s%> that was <S%H5414>given<s%> thee, thy <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%>?

What wilt thou <S%H559>say<s%> when he shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> thee? for thou hast <S%H3925>taught<s%> them to be <S%H441>captains<s%>, and as <S%H7218>chief<s%> over thee: shall not <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> <S%H270>take<s%> thee, as a <S%H802>woman<s%> in <S%H3205>travail<s%>?

¶ And if thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Wherefore <S%H7122>come<s%> these things upon me? For the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> are thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, and thy <S%H6119>heels<s%> made <S%H2554>bare<s%>.

Can the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H2015>change<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%>, or the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> his <S%H2272>spots<s%>? then <S%H3201>may<s%> ye also do <S%H3190>good<s%>, that are <S%H3928>accustomed<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%>.
Therefore will I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away<s%> by the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

This is thy <S%H1486>lot<s%>, the <S%H4490>portion<s%> of thy <S%H4055>measures<s%> from me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; because thou hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, and <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.
Therefore will I <S%H2834>discover<s%> thy <S%H7757>skirts<s%> upon thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, that thy <S%H7036>shame<s%> may <S%H7200>appear<s%>.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thine <S%H5004>adulteries<s%>, and thy <S%H4684>neighings<s%>, the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of thy <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, and thine <S%H8251>abominations<s%> on the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>. <S%H188>Woe<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>! wilt thou not be made <S%H2891>clean<s%>? when shall it <S%H5750%H310>once<s%> be?
